SEARCH
Module VetAppointmentPortal
Package com.vetportal.service

Class AppointmentService

java.lang.Object
com.vetportal.service.AppointmentService
public class AppointmentService extends Object
Service layer responsible for appointment-related business logic.

Delegates database operations to the AppointmentDAO and wraps results in ServiceResponse objects to include status and error handling.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentService

      public AppointmentService(Connection conn)
      Constructs a new AppointmentService using the given database connection. Initializes the necessary DAOs (CustomerDAO, EmployeeDAO, PetDAO, and AppointmentDAO) for appointment operations.
      Parameters:
      conn - an active SQL database connection

  • Method Details

    • createAppointment

      public ServiceResponse<Appointment> createAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Creates a new appointment in the database.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to create
      Returns:
      a service response containing the created appointment or an error

    • isProviderSlotTaken

      public boolean isProviderSlotTaken(int providerId, LocalDate date, LocalTime time, Integer excludeAppointmentId)
      Checks if a provider is already booked at a specific date and time. Since database has a constraint UNIQUE (provider, date, time). Helps catch a conflict before an error.
      Parameters:
      providerId - the ID of the provider
      date - the date of the appointment
      time - the time of the appointment
      excludeAppointmentId - optional ID of an appointment to exclude from the check (for updates)
      Returns:
      true if the slot is already taken, false otherwise

    • findAppointmentsByAttributes

      public ServiceResponse<List<Appointment>> findAppointmentsByAttributes(Map<String,String> attributes)
      Looks up appointments by various attributes.
      Parameters:
      attributes - map of attribute names to values to search for
      Returns:
      a service response containing the appointments or an error

    • getAllAppointments

      public ServiceResponse<List<Appointment>> getAllAppointments()
      Retrieves all appointments from the database.
      Returns:
      a service response containing the list of appointments or an error
